skills.title: Front-End

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Empowering robust and scalable web applications with the MERN stack. Specializing in building secure, efficient, and high-performance backend systems using MongoDB, Express.js, and Node.js.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Crafting intuitive and visually captivating user experiences. Combining creativity with user-centered design principles to deliver seamless and engaging interfaces.
